Name: Banana Invaders
About the game: You are trapped by a group of mischievous monkeys which decided to have some fun at your expense. Get ready to defend yourself from the neverending onslaught of bananas! Are you crazy enough to go BANANAS ?! Banana Invaders is a fast-paced shooter in which your success is fully dependent on your ability to swiftly pinpoint where your enemies are coming from. Can you hear, detect and shoot them down before they hit you? - Expierience a new dimension of in-game sound thanks to our own audio engine SoundToolKit, - Gather your friends and see who can get the highest score, - Be the best and have your name ushered into the HoloFame
Meta Title: Banana Invaders: Sep 5, 2019, Techmo and Full Overview
